rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
地中海饮食加乳制品有望降低心脏病风险一项为期 8 周的研究发现，补充乳制品的地中海饮食会改变特定的肠道细菌，并对心血管疾病高危澳大利亚人的收缩压产生积极影响。研究结果表明，这种 MedDairy 饮食可能是降低心血管风险的有效策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Mediterranean-diet-with-a-dairy-twist-shows-promise-in-lowering-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Mediterranean-diet-with-a-dairy-twist-shows-promise-in-lowering-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd948ef4-3b58-4428-a487-be21cd5cef8c Thu, 31 Aug 2023 00:24:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet with a dairy twist shows promise in lowering heart disease risk
研究称，第四种 COVID-19 加强剂可增强老年人的抗体防御能力研究发现，第四剂 COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗可显着提高老年人的中和抗体水平，从而增强对 Omicron 等新 SARS-CoV-2 变种的保护。这支持了老年人群加强注射在对抗 COVID-19 方面的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Fourth-COVID-19-booster-supercharges-antibody-defense-in-older-adults-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Fourth-COVID-19-booster-supercharges-antibody-defense-in-older-adults-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f11ab7f-0d19-43ec-84dd-28eb4449aa25 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 00:07:00 -0400 Fourth COVID-19 booster supercharges antibody defense in older adults, study says
如何在面临生育挑战的女性癌症幸存者中推广健康饮食习惯癌症诊断会增加年轻女性不孕的风险。虽然人们发现健康饮食（包括全谷物、水果、蔬菜和健康脂肪酸）可以提高生育能力和癌症生存率，但超过 90% 的年轻成年癌症幸存者没有达到饮食建议，他们的饮食包括高脂肪和低水果和蔬菜摄入量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/How-to-promote-healthy-diet-practices-among-female-cancer-survivors-with-fertility-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/How-to-promote-healthy-diet-practices-among-female-cancer-survivors-with-fertility-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8559f246-149a-4543-9eae-af03ac323e9a Wed, 30 Aug 2023 23:38:01 -0400 How to promote healthy diet practices among female cancer survivors with fertility challenges
家庭排卵监测与医院体外受精检查一样有效在体外受精过程中放置​​冷冻胚胎之前在家监测排卵与医院检查以确定最佳时间一样有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Home-monitoring-of-ovulation-as- effective-as-hospital-checks-for-IVF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Home-monitoring-of-ovulation-as- effective-as-hospital-checks-for-IVF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c162008d-15b6-436c-aa68-a1a27b7569a0 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 23:31:14 -0400 Home monitoring of ovulation as effective as hospital checks for IVF
干细胞基因疗法可能为镰状细胞病提供一种有前景的治愈方法《新英格兰医学杂志》发表的新研究表明，干细胞基因疗法可能为痛苦的遗传性血液疾病镰状细胞病 (SCD) 提供一种有希望的治愈方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Stem-cell-gene-therapy-may-offer-a-promising-curative-treatment-for-sickle-cell-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Stem-cell-gene-therapy-may-offer-a-promising-curative-treatment-for-sickle-cell-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=913398f6-bbbd-423d-a6ee-002ac41e55d8 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 23:19:24 -0400 Stem cell gene therapy may offer a promising, curative treatment for sickle cell disease
富锌土壤有助于预防儿童发育迟缓相对较小的干预措施可能会对困扰发展中国家儿童的破坏性病症产生巨大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Zinc-enriched-soil-could-help-prevent-childhood-stunting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Zinc-enriched-soil-could-help-prevent-childhood-stunting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02710c74-8548-442b-a5a5-2d02a3a2160b Wed, 30 Aug 2023 23:14:27 -0400 Zinc-enriched soil could help prevent childhood stunting
肠道微生物组与婴儿期湿疹有关一项新的研究揭示了肠道微生物群与婴儿期湿疹之间的重要关联，并为通过调节肠道微生物群潜在预防和治疗湿疹奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Gut-Microbiome-linked-to-eczema-in-infancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Gut-Microbiome-linked-to-eczema-in-infancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18fb3c78-b3ef-40d9-ad06-2ca8497f4d27 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 23:09:00 -0400 Gut microbiome linked to eczema in infancy
美国青少年吸食 CBD 的速度惊人：研究揭示了趋势背后令人惊讶的因素最近的 JAMA Network Open 研究发现，美国青少年中 CBD 电子烟的流行率很高，其中西班牙裔和性少数群体青少年的比例更高。该研究呼吁开展有针对性的教育活动和更严格的法规来遏制这种日益增长的趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/US-teens-vaping-CBD-at-alarming-rates-Study-reveals-surprising-factors-behind-trend.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/US-teens-vaping-CBD-at-alarming-rates-Study-reveals-surprising-factors-behind-trend.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3966d9a7-871f-47d6-a28a-1ac5c18b092d Wed, 30 Aug 2023 23:03:00 -0400 U.S. teens vaping CBD at alarming rates: Study reveals surprising factors behind trend
新的血液检测可以更早地诊断帕金森病研究人员开发了一种检测帕金森病的血液测试，有可能建立一种在神经系统损伤恶化之前帮助诊断帕金森病的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Parkinsons-disease-diagnosis-could-be-made-earlier-with-new-blood-test.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Parkinsons-disease-diagnosis-could-be-made-earlier-with-new-blood-test.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7af339fb-e700-428e-af77-9ebe4d75c329 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 22:57:37 -0400 Parkinson's disease diagnosis could be made earlier with new blood test
新研究质疑一刀切的心脏健康饮食指南研究对减少心血管疾病的常见饮食建议提出了挑战，强调年龄、性别和生活方式等因素会显着影响动物源食品对心脏健康的影响。它表明，红肉摄入量（而非总体动物源性食物摄入量）可能表明不健康的生活方式和心血管疾病风险升高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/New-study-questions-one-size-fits-all-dietary-guidelines-for-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/New-study-questions-one-size-fits-all-dietary-guidelines-for-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=006a8b65-d2d3-4d8b-a759-2f177ac68c3e Wed, 30 Aug 2023 22:52:00 -0400 New study questions one-size-fits-all dietary guidelines for heart health
